title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Qi Qu Wai Xing Ke
synopsis: A new alien villain has appeared in the mysterious outer space! Wisdom Goat and Li Goat reappear, and Sister Pleasant makes her debut? With new characters, inventions, and plots, how should the sheep and sheep resolve the crisis this time?(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之奇趣外星客

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yiguo Da Yingjiu
synopsis: The strange cat country fell into chaos due to the dark power. Pleasant Goat and her partners accidentally rescued Princess Haoyue from the strange cat country. To help Princess Haoyue, they set off for the strange cat country. Unexpectedly, in the process, except for Lazy Goat and Big Big Wolf, all the companions were The queen's blackening control is against them. Along the way, the Lazy Goat and Big Big Wolf, who have no power to bind the chicken, are rounded up by their fellow cat-like Pleasant Goats. Can they wake up their companions with their love? And Princess Haoyue, who was walking along the way, seemed to be worried, what was the dark energy hiding behind? All mysteries are in "Exotic Rescue".(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之異國大營救

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Xiyangyang You Shibo
synopsis: The World Expo, which attracted worldwide attention, finally kicked off in Shanghai. Two years ago, the sheep became Happy Goat Tour Expo stills Happy Goat Tour Expo stills Gong participated in the Goat and Goat Games, and of course they would not miss this grand event. Look, the lambs are ready to go, and can't wait to rush to the Expo site! The Expo Park is magnificent, dazzling in shape, and colorful in content. What the lambs see is dazzling. Without the appearance of Big Big Wolf, the lambs will have an easy journey. What a pity, things are counterproductive! The Big Gray Wolf, who has never been resigned to loneliness, not only will not miss this once-in-a-century event, but also wonders how to take the sheep home and honor his wife. So Big Big Wolf has long sneaked into the Expo Park, waiting for the opportunity to catch sheep. Since ancient times, it’s no good where there is Big Big Wolf. When he learned that there was no wolf on the British island, Big Big Wolf began to take pictures of the British Pavilion and destroy the stadium; when he learned that the Little Mermaid had come thousands of miles from Denmark , I was afraid that Red Wolf would hurt my self-esteem, and tried every means to destroy the Little Mermaid... Faced with the evil deeds of Big Big Wolf, the lambs stepped forward to resolve the crisis and protect the Expo venues. At the same time, the lambs have to try to avoid the traps and dewclaws of the wolf. For a while, the big gray wolf hid in the alpine snowdrift in the Austrian Pavilion and ambushed the lamb; then he drugged the lamb in the special pure water of the Dutch Pavilion, trying to stun the lamb. In short, he used everything available in the various exhibition halls to take the sheep hand in hand, but unfortunately all these were seen through by the lambs. In the end, Big Gray Wolf had to return empty-handed and suffered the pan of his wife Red Wolf. Although the lambs have had to fight the Big Big Wolf all the way, but at the same time they have a clearer understanding of the characteristics of the various pavilions in the Expo and the history of their country. The United Kingdom is the first country to host the World Expo. Their pavilion is like a dandelion dancing in the wind; Santa Claus who is loved by children all over the world is originally from Finland, and their pavilion is like a curling kettle; the Indian pavilion can go back in time , The American Pavilion can travel to the future... When the lambs walked through the Expo site, they realized that they seemed to have traveled around the world. Not only did they see the beauty and beauty of all parts of the world, they also tasted the delicious food from all over the world. The customs and customs of all parts of the world have increased knowledge, deepened experience, and enhanced friendship with people from all over the world. "City, make life better"-the lambs firmly believe in this and agree to take care of our city, innovate our city in the future life, let life and city complement each other, continue to develop, and perfectly integrate. When leaving the World Expo, the lambs all had satisfied smiles on their faces. Although the journey was not easy because of the troubles of Big Big Wolf, it was colorful, full of harvest, and unforgettable for life!(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊與灰太狼之喜羊羊游世博

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Man Jingtou
synopsis: "Diffuse Lens" is an animated series of "Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf" produced by Original Dynamics. It is based on the most popular serialized comics of the magazine of the same name "Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf". The animation is produced in comic style, bringing the double impact of animation + comics to the audience. The animation tells the story of the little sheep, in order to retrieve more than 8 million missing stationery in Qingqing Grassland, catch up with the stars, participate in the Interstellar Stationery King Competition, and retrieve the stationery.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之漫镜头

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Yangyang Deyi Xiyangyang
synopsis: The recap of "Xiyangyang Yu Huītailang" anime main series.

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之洋洋得意喜羊羊

title: Jia Ren Jiu Jia Huitailang
synopsis: The story tells the inspirational story of Wolffy, a human with the spirit of Wolffy, as a fresh graduated rookie in the workplace. The story tells that the protagonist Hu Fei will enter a coveted advertising company. He wants to take this opportunity to make a big splash. But unexpectedly, this company pursues the "wolf culture" of the weak and the strong. The office culture of the workplace is like a battlefield, and the rookie Hu Fei is caught off guard. This is how Hu Fei’s series of hilarious stories of "Daguai Upgrade" began...(translated from douban)

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Zhi Qu Yang Xuetang Dong Zhiwu Pian
synopsis: One day, Big Big Wolf and Little Sheep came to the library with rich knowledge. They found an encyclopedia and a camera here. The curious lambs opened the encyclopedia, but found that the content in the encyclopedia was incomplete. The studious lambs and Big Big Wolf decided to step out of the green grassland for an interesting nature adventure! Along the way, they passed through the cold North Pole and raced with cute polar bears; they also went deep into the fantasy sea and played with smart dolphins; they also ran to the grasslands to watch the spectacular dandelion flowers take off; they even went to the hot Africa , Make friends with the robust elephant. Through this way of going out and exploring and interacting with nature, the lambs and big big wolves gradually learned a variety of novel and interesting natural sciences and common sense of life. The encyclopedia, which was originally incomplete, was gradually restored by the lambs. The lambs also learned a wealth of knowledge during the expedition, and gained many precious memories and friendships.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之智趣羊学堂 动植物篇

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Zhi Qu Yang Xuetang Yundong Pian
synopsis: In the Smart Sheep School in Qingqing Prairie, the cute and healthy lambs and the naughty and brave Big Gray Wolf will show the children the fun and style of sports in various ways. Through sports competitions, the children will recognize persistence, hard work, Good and active sportsmanship such as not giving up, unity, fraternity, collaboration, etc. As the lambs help other small animals, the children will realize the courage required for pole vault and the safer and more scientific pole vault method; following the steps of the lambs, the children will travel from ancient times to modern times , To witness the marathon legend; in the football match between the Lambs and Big Big Wolf, you will also realize that football is not a sport that emphasizes individual heroism, and the spirit of unity and determination can bring the glory of victory! The lambs not only teach the children to exercise, but also let the children deeply understand the brighter and more moving spirit of sports. Healthy exercise, happy growth, Zhiqu Sheep School, learn not only knowledge.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之智趣羊学堂 运动篇

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Zhi Qu Yang Xuetang Diqiu Jianianhua
synopsis: The Moving Earth Carnival came to Qingqing Grassland. In order to win the ultimate prize of the Carnival-Encyclopedia, the Lambs and Big Big Wolf enter the rides in the Carnival Challenge and collect game ticket stubs. In the carnival, the lambs met the sister of the tour guide Globe. Under the guidance and guidance of the globe, they took a roller coaster to the sky and into the sea to experience the process of the water cycle; they also went to the weather house to explore and met meteorological families such as wind, rain, thunder, and snow; they also took a four-season parade float to help spring, summer, autumn and winter. Smooth transition. In order to collect more ticket stubs than the lambs, Big Big Wolf always scrambled to challenge the rides, but they all failed. The lambs actively used their brains and frequently won the top spot. In the process of having fun, Sheep Wolf gradually learned a wealth of natural science and geographic knowledge, and has a deeper understanding of the structure and operation of the earth. As the lambs and Big Big Wolf held more and more ticket stubs, they finally succeeded in redeeming the encyclopedia, and they also gained a lot of precious knowledge and memories.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之智趣羊学堂 地球嘉年华

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Zhi Qu Yang Xuetang Yang Yang You Shijie
synopsis: Slow Goat has hidden the treasure house of knowledge in a certain corner of the world. According to the clues left by Slow Goat and Big Big Wolf, they embark on a global treasure hunt. During the journey, the lambs and Big Big Wolf put on colorful traditional costumes and explored the mysterious relics of various countries; met foreign friends with different personalities and experienced unique exotic festivals; traveled across the four oceans and five continents to reach the world At the end, feel the bipolar style full of mystery. Through outings, sheep and wolves gradually broadened their horizons. They not only experienced the pleasant natural scenery of various countries in the world, but also experienced the unique local culture and customs, not only tasted the long-lasting food, but also saw the wisdom left by the ancient ancestors. crystallization. The lambs recorded the bits and pieces of the journey as they walked, wrote their own treasure trove of knowledge, felt that reading thousands of books is not as fun as traveling thousands of miles, and at the same time showed everyone a different exotic style.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之智趣羊学堂  羊羊游世界

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Zhi Qu Yang Xuetang Qihuan Chengyu Shu
synopsis: The wolves and sheeps accidentally messed up the world in the idiom book, so they entered the idiom world and helped the characters inside to fix the idiom. The boring idiom story is re-interpreted by Lamb and Big Big Wolf, which makes the eyes shine. In the process of repairing idioms, the lambs not only deeply understood the meaning of idioms, but also learned various principles of life.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之智趣羊学堂 奇幻成语书

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Zhi Qu Yang Xuetang Yang Yang Lai Xunbao
synopsis: All kinds of Chinese treasures in the wonderful treasure chest escaped, and the lambs were commissioned by Grandpa Panda to find them. In the process of treasure hunting, the lambs not only learned a lot of traditional Chinese culture, but also learned the interesting and touching stories behind each treasure. Not only have they recovered their treasures, but they also appreciate the inclusiveness and long history of Chinese traditional culture. They also love Chinese traditional culture, and pass it on with joy, persistence, and touch.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之智趣羊学堂 羊羊来寻宝

title: Xiyangyang Yu Huitailang Zhi Zhi Qu Yang Xuetang Yang Yang Qu Maoxian
synopsis: Chinese poster: There is a signal for help from the microcosm. Pleasant Goat and his friends use Big Big Wolf’s invention to transform into mini lambs, ride in the cool car that Slow Goat gave them, and go to the micro world. Various exhibitions can help everyone solve various problems. All kinds of problems. English poster translation: This story-driven educational entertainment series features the bizarre adventures of Pleasant Goat and his friends in a small world that they have never found on the green grassland before. In each episode, those ordinary lambs accept mysterious missions and become a powerful lamb team to rescue those trapped lambs. When they get younger, they have the opportunity to explore the inconspicuous places in their daily lives and see the world from a perspective they have never tried. From each adventure, Pleasant Goat and his friends learned to build teamwork and friendship with their insignificant and important friends. On the other hand, their children encourage them to push their limits. Keep your little curiosity and discover a big world with a strong lamb team! Character introduction(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之智趣羊学堂 羊羊趣冒险

title: Songdai Zuqiu Xiaojiang
synopsis: Song Huanghui Hanzong Zhao Ji was very good at Cuju, and Gao Qi, a traitorous minister, was rewarded for his outstanding skills. The Northern Jins were strong and thrived at the same time. They proposed that the victory or defeat of Cuju determines the survival of the country. Regardless of national interests and national dignity, Gao Liu sent assassins to kill Hong Feng, Xiang Liuyun and others. Xingfeng and Yun worked hard in the process of entering the "Qiyun Society" in the "Taihelou", "Crescent Moon Like a Hook", "Two Persons Are Little Tips", "Kunlun Three Feet" and other stunts. With the help of children, Jin Baobao and Gao Chengxia female Qiuyan, they finally defeated the Jinren and eliminated the disaster of the country at the critical moment of life and death. He also brought Huizong's special golden boots and his family escaped from the high mountains to chase down and traveled to the Western Regions, spreading the Chinese Cuju culture to the world. (translated from douban)

title: Baobei Nuer Hao Mama
synopsis: Chen Weilin (voiced by Sun Jinhua) has been a small section chief of a state-owned enterprise for more than 20 years. Although he has been working hard to get a promotion, he still seems to be unable to seize the opportunity. Wu Xianhui (voiced by Deng Yuting) is a typical housewife, hot with big waves, likes playing mahjong and watching TV dramas. She is happy all day long and seems to have no trouble. 　　 These two people with very different personalities became husband and wife by coincidence. They also gave birth to two lovely daughters, Chen Dadi (voiced by Zu Qing) and Chen Xiaodi (played by Liang Ying). Chen Dadi's personality is like a mother. He is an eccentric spirit advocating freedom, often indulged in fantasy, and will feel a little discouraged when he wakes up. Chen Xiaodi is like a father, with a kind heart under the appearance of being smart. A happy family, trusting and supporting each other, they form a "home" and they are indispensable.(translated from douban)

title: Baobei Nuer Hao Mama Zhi Kuaile De Jiating
synopsis: The life of the Chen family (small and small di family) has undergone great changes in the past few years. The fried chicken shop opened by father Chen Weilin has been steadily rising since it was named "Bombing Chicken". They moved out of their old house and bought a new house in the suburbs. Xiao Di also has her own bedroom, so she doesn't need to live in the same room with her sister. Dad also bought a QQ car for transportation. This QQ car has the dual functions of a passenger car and a truck. 　　The new home is far away from the city, and Da Di has to squeeze the subway to go to work every day during peak hours. To work in the company, Da Di must act like a desperate Saburo in order not to be fired. Fortunately, she met Ma Linshu who was an actress in a puppet theater. The two fell in love at first sight, but Da Di was too busy to date. 　　 Ma Linshu, as a small actor who is similar to a freelancer, always has a lot of free time. He happily comes to Daddy for a date every time, but any phone call from Daddy’s boss, client or even colleague will make the appointment ruin. After finally getting through the weekend, Ma Linshu felt that he finally had time! But for Da Di on weekends, it is a rare time to make up for sleep! 　　 Mom’s biggest interest was playing mahjong and perming her hair. But since Ma Linshu appeared, her mother has found a new joy in life-beating a mandarin duck. My mother said to Da Di: Ma Linshu is a person who spends half of his life suffering from gains and losses, and half of his life. 　　 The love path of this little couple has just begun, and it is already in danger. 　　 Xiaodi went to junior high school and still had poor grades. She is always confused and lazy. She often forgets to do her homework on time, but can always remember the number of snacks at home. 　　Daddy is still busy "bombing chicken", busy writing his poems, and worrying that no one appreciates it. 　　 Everyone in the family seems to be extremely busy, but grandma too often stays at home alone, very lonely. She hoped that they could spend more time with her, but she felt sorry for them and didn't want to take up their few rest time. 　　 Grandma Tai wrote to her sister Furong in order to eliminate loneliness. She did not find a suitable letterhead, so she wrote on the back of an old calendar. The front of the calendar is a photo of "Shenzhou VII". 　　Furong’s great-grandson Haohao is pestering her to ask where her parents are? It turned out that Haohao's parents divorced and fostered him at the grandmother's house. Grandma Tai is unwilling to hurt Haohao, and every day she makes up a beautiful lie to deal with Haohao. Just when she was racking her brains, the doorbell rang, and she opened the door and saw the postman standing outside, with a letter for her to sign. Grandma Haohaotai said: This is a letter from your father. Haohao looked forward to seeing Grandma Tai open the envelope. He saw the picture of "Shenzhou VII" and said: Wow! Does my father live in such an impressive house? 　　 Haohao kept this matter in his mind and asked his grandma a lot about outer space. It didn't take long for him to start looking for his father. Haohao asked Grandma Tai, is the address on the envelope where Dad lives? Grandma too said yes. Haohao didn't tell her grandma to put on his pet-a cat that looked like a pig, and got on the train to find his father. 　　 A few days later, he knocked on the door of the Chen family. Too grandma opened the door, but Xiao Di was stunned, because Haohao's first sentence was: Is this the landing module of "Shenzhou Seven"? The Chen family was in a mess with a strange child who was full of spaceships in outer space. Grandma too learned of the situation from Furong, so the whole family held a meeting to study the matter. Grandma Tai insisted on keeping Haohao, but her family members opposed it. But when they learned that Haohao's parents had divorced, they decided to keep him. In this way, Haohao began his life in the Chen family. 　　 A few days after Haohao moved in, his mother took Haohao to the school. But because Haohao was too eccentric, he was always dropped out of school. In a short time, Haohao was on the blacklist for admission to this district. In desperation, Haohao had no choice but to go to a private primary school-Baihua Primary School. Baihua Primary School was rented by the principal at a low price in an old teaching building inside Xiaodi School. The principal and Hao Hao hit it off right away, and felt that he had the style of his childhood, so he readily accepted Hao Hao. 　　 Haohao became Xiao Di's alumnus, but Xiao Di disdain to admit that he has a younger brother who goes to school in a dilapidated old building. Xiao Di always said that I am different from you, and I went to school in the new shiny golden building. Haohao didn't care about her, so he looked for her sister when it was time to look for her, which caused a lot of trouble to Xiao Di who was afraid of trouble and lazy. But once Haohao had difficulties, Xiao Di would still come forward. 　　 There is a transfer student Xiao Xiaochao in Xiaodi’s class. Xiaodi sees Xiaochao thin and thinks that Xiaochao’s family is very poor. She brought a fried chicken drumstick to Xiao Xiaochao every day and told him that it was free! One day, Xiao Xiaochao did not come to class. Xiao Di was worried about whether Xiao Xiaochao was sick because of hunger, but suddenly heard the rumbling outside the classroom, and the classmates outside screamed. Xiao Di took a closer look and found that Xiao Xiaochao came to school in a helicopter! On the opposite side of Dad’s "Bombing Chicken" shop, a new opponent called "Battle Chicken" came; Mom secretly rented her garage to someone else as a warehouse; Da Di’s boyfriend Ma Linshu unexpectedly became popular, and Da Di’s Happy and worried; Xiao Di, who has always been only interested in eating and sleeping, has recently suddenly become diligent and beautiful. It turns out that the most innocent feelings for Xiao Chao have sprouted in a small heart; and Hao Hao and Grandma are the oldest The little hearts are getting closer and closer, as close as grandchildren... 　　 What other unexpected stories happened in the Chen family? In any case, the family is working hard, diligently, and sincerely living in this city, performing their joys, sorrows and joys.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 寶貝女兒好媽媽之快樂的家庭

title: Baobei Nuer Hao Mama Zhi Chi Jiyi De Daxue Qiu
synopsis: In the city, the family of ordinary citizens, Chen Xiaodi, lives in a calm and worry-free life. The resolute and courageous father Chen Weilin, unable to resist the temptation of a generous cash prize, took a family of young and old to participate in the "Family Mobilization". The agile and flexible Da Di, the full-fledged Xiao Di, the fat and bloated mother, and the grandma of the ghost horse spirit all joined the "Chen Family Warriors". With the winning ticket in hand, the brave dad was scared out of his soul by a little hedgehog doll. I didn't get the grand prize, but got the name of "the most timid dad in history". 　　 Sad Xiao Di proposed to find the legendary "Hoggett" kingdom, where there are mysterious big snowballs that can eat "unhappy memories". Amidst all odds, the whole family came to the wonderful animal kingdom. Here, birds can speak human words, and animals can judge humans! After fleeing life and death, Xiaodi's family finally found the legendary Snowball, but the father who was the first step had lost his memory, and the whole family became strangers. What is the fate of Xiaodi's family?(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 宝贝女儿好妈妈之吃记忆的大雪球

title: Xiao Song Dangjia
synopsis: In a small town in southern China in the 1930s, in an old house with a height of one and a half stories, Xiao Song (Song Li) and his aunt Song Xin lived as a refugee. The two depended on the small cake shop opened in front of the house. They made delicious and cheap biscuits, which won everyone's praise. The money they could make was only enough for Xiao Song to study and maintain a basic life, mainly because many people lived after the war. They are very difficult. Although Song Xin's cakes are popular with everyone, they are very self-denying and low in price, so they don't make much money. In addition to class, Xiao Song has to help his aunt make cakes and watch the shop in the rest of the time. 　　Because Xiao Song's parents have died since his young child, only his aunt Song Xin is dependent on him. So Song Xin is very strict with Xiao Song. In addition to asking Xiao Song to read a book, he also wants Song to inherit the true biography of his dead father and family. 　　 The Song family was already well-known in the mainland before the war. The family inherited the Chinese "etiquette" festival and created many cake-making secrets with originality. A simple piece of cake embodies family affection, heart, friendship, and closeness. Although a piece of pie is an invaluable thing, if people keep the gift, the relationship between the person and the person, the relationship between family members, and the relationship between friends must be more intimate and harmonious. Because you personally deliver a delicious cake to your loved ones, the recipients will feel that they are valued and cared by relatives and friends. Therefore, the pie maker must not be sloppy with every piece of pie, and must show full sincerity. Xiao Song was educated in this way by his aunt since he was a child, so he would be rude to classmates, friends, and even seeing others passing by, disrespect of elders, arrogant, detrimental, self-interested, and irresponsible, he would stand up, if others do not listen to persuasion , He will try to let the person know his mistake, and finally apologize. But there are many people who are not polite and selfish, and they listen to less advice. When Xiao Song can't figure out a way, he will run to the attic of the cabin, where his aunt who made mistakes since childhood punished him to study. Xiao Song would eat a piece of cake made by his aunt with his father’s secret recipe, open the classics left by his father, and return to the ancient times in meditation, where Xiao Song would respectfully ask his deceased elder Song Bing for advice. The optimistic old man, let Song Bing give him inspiration and direction, and then return to the real world, using some intelligent methods to teach or help the public, and even solve large and small problems. 　　 Xiao Song and Song Xin’s relationship is very good. Song Xin has high hopes for Xiao Song, and Xiao Song has lived up to her expectations, doing her part in school and cake affairs, and being an excellent child. Surrounded by friends around Xiao Song, including the cute and smart female classmate Xiao Tao, she is a good student of Xiao Song's childhood sweetheart and a good confidant of his like-mindedness. When they encounter difficulties and injustices together, they will face them together and solve problems with mutual help. 　　 In addition, Xiao Song’s teacher, Mr. Situ, also taught Xiao Song a lot of useful knowledge and principles of life. Although Mr. Situ’s school is arduously operated, it has helped many children to read and write and cultivate talents. On the contrary, the overlord general in town is a nasty guy. He relied on taking military power, and often together with his little wife, Xiaolian, oppressed the common people. Fortunately, the resourceful Xiao Song was able to suppress the general’s arrogance, and sometimes even let the generals and his wife in public. Make a fool of yourself, very happy. In the town, there are also a classmate Xiaofu who likes to relax and hate work, A Niu, a hard-working and straightforward truck driver, Xiao Tao’s petty father, the treasurer of money, a kind and loving old woman, Granny Liang, and all kinds of passers-by. They are all ordinary. The common people have constructed a simple small society. In Xiao Song's life, there are joys and sorrows, gains and losses, but there is no doubt that Xiao Song has experienced a lot of the principles of being a person from daily life-wealth and glory are external objects, love and kindness remain in the heart. The cake he and his aunt made will be passed down forever. (translated from douban)

title: Dianji Xiaozi
synopsis: When the nut thief attacked Kaby, Xiaoguang's inner sense of justice was aroused, but how could a primary school student fight against a burly nut thief with a special nut gun in his hand. Fortunately, Kirby gave Xiaoguang a secret weapon at a critical juncture, and Dengeki was born! (translated from douban)

title: Dianji Xiaozi Season 2
synopsis: "Dengeki Kid 2" tells that Xiaoguang is a fifth-grade student. He accidentally encountered Kabi, a multifunctional robot from the future, in a big house because he participated in a TV game show. Since then, Xiaoguang's life has undergone tremendous changes. . Kabi came from the future world to the modern world. He originally had an important task behind him, but at the same time it attracted the future ambitious scientist Mysterious Man sent a robot Ruby from the future to the modern world. Thanks to Kirby’s assistance, Xiaoguang got the transformation watch. In a critical moment, he can transform into the future policeman: the electric shock boy by pressing the transformation button on the watch. After transforming, it not only possesses powerful power, but the electric shock device above the head can also emit thunder electric shock light. In the future, Kabi will specially make various new weapons for the electric shock kid to deal with Ruby's evil conspiracy.(translated from douban)

title: Dianji Xiaozi Part 3
synopsis: "Dengeki Kid 3: The Four Saints", the second season of the story, Dengeki Kid continues to guard the peace of his home. However, they must not only improve their abilities, but also travel through time and space, struggling to prevent the "Four Saints Group" of time and space pirates from doing evil. During this process, the electric shock kid and his partners have continuously improved with their own efforts and various magic weapons. At the same time, Xiaoguang and others gradually realized the true meaning of growth and never gave up in the face of setbacks.(translated from douban)

title: Douluo Dalu II: Jueshi Tangmen
synopsis: A land without magic, dou-qi or martial arts, but having essence spirits. This is the combat continent 10 000 years after the formation of Tang Sect. A new hero and his friends walk the land. There are new "Seven Monsters of Shrek." Will the Tang Sect be able to struggle through? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system? (Source: MU)

details.Synonyms: Soul Land 2, Combat Continent 2, Peerless Tang Sect
details.Japanese: 斗罗大陆 II: 绝世唐门

title: Doraemon Movie 41: Nobita no Little Star Wars
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
background: This work is a remake of Doraemon Movie 06: Nobita no Little Star Wars released in 1985.

details.English: Doraemon the Movie 2021: Nobita's Space War (Little Star Wars)
details.Synonyms: Doraemon the Movie 2021: Nobita's Space War, Doraemon the Movie 2021: Nobita no Uchuu Shou Sensou
details.Japanese: 映画ドラえもん のび太の宇宙小戦争（リトルスターウォーズ） 2021

title: Zannen na Ikimono Jiten (2019)
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Synonyms: Encyclopedia of Pitiful Creatures (2019)
details.Japanese: ざんねんないきもの事典 (2019)

title: Lei Su Deng Zhi Yi Fei Chongtian
synopsis: The cartoon "Raising Wings and Flying Wings / Wings Flying to the Sky" The complete works of Leisu Dengfeis Flying to the sky tells about the teenager Meng Fei, a young man with the ability to "control" the wind. Influenced by the pilot's father, he is very talented in remote control helicopters. . Due to her mother's job transfer, Meng Fei returned to his hometown. It was a small town where remote control helicopters were popular. He met Yi Xuan, a girl who is a master of remote control helicopters. In order to find the mysterious person who taught him how to play remote control helicopters when he was a child, Meng Fei agreed to team up with Yi Xuan to compete, and under Yi Xuan's training, his skills continued to improve. Later, they helped Xiao Ming, a frail young man, overcome his timid weakness and let him join the team. The Yi Fei Soaring Team was established. 　　 There are two other remote control helicopter masters in the small town: Gao Chong and Zhuo Yi. Although they are masters, the two of them hated helicopters because of the shadows when they were young, and used it to cause damage on the court, which made Yi Xuan very hated. Fan Xiaotian, a liar teenager, wished to join the team of the two on the condition of spying on the intelligence of the Lei Su Deng Yi Fei Soo team, but was ruthlessly used. The members of the Wing Fei Soaring Team disregarded the previous suspicions and agreed to join Fan Xiaotian after seeing that they had changed their past. Although Gao Chong and Zhuo Yi have been inseparable partners since childhood, Zhuo Yi's arrogant game style made Zhuo Yi increasingly dissatisfied. At the same time, he was also infected by the love of helicopters from the members of the Yi Fei Sky team, so they resolutely broke with Gao Chong. After some twists and turns, Zhuo Yi and Yi Xuan finally settled their suspicions and became their teammates. At this time, Meng Fei's father returned to China and continuously helped Meng Fei's people to improve their skills with completely new methods, but there were also ridiculous and absurdities, and many jokes were made. After 　　 broke with Zhuo Yi, Gao Chong met a mysterious person. He was fired from the airport for teaching Meng Fei to play helicopters. After being fired, the mysterious man met his young father Meng Fei, and the two became very close friends. Later, because of differences in game tactics, he and Meng Fei's father became enemies and became sinister and vicious. After seeing Gao Chong's talent in remote control helicopters, he decided to accept him as an apprentice and teach him to use various despicable methods to control the remote control industry. 　　 So the Wing Fei soaring team and Gao Chong, the mysterious man began to constantly compete. Everyone obtained an upgraded version of the helicopter through hard work and different methods, and they began to gain a new understanding through mutual exchanges. Gao Chong and Mysterious Man were also gradually moved by the sincerity of the members of the Yifei Sky Team and their persistent love for helicopters. Gao Chong is willing to become friends with everyone in Meng Fei. 　　 At this time, the manager of the remote control field invited the current world champion to participate in a large competition he held. The champion once stole a new helicopter developed by Mysterious Man and Meng Fei's father and used it to dominate the remote control industry. The mysterious man participated in the competition for revenge. In order to prevent his revenge, Meng Fei's father also participated in the competition masked to protect Meng Fei from the world champion. In the game, the world champion revealed its sinister true colors, defeating opponents one by one with despicable methods, even the mysterious man is no exception. In the end, Meng Fei and his father worked together and finally outsmarted the world champion. Through this competition, the world champion finally realized the mistakes he had made, and let the mysterious man clear his mind. As a result, everyone continues to fly in the remote control world with their immense love for remote control helicopters............(translated from douban)

title: Yi Fei Chongtian Zhi Tianji Zhan Qi
synopsis: In order to arrest the cosmic criminal (a genius scientist) Migu, the Galactic Guard Captain Qinglong pursued all the way, but fell into a trap during the battle with Migu and came to Earth by accident. On the earth, Qinglong got acquainted with Tianyi, a kind and just boy. Unexpectedly, Weigu also followed to the earth, and after discovering that the earth had abundant species resources, he decided to transform the earth creatures into his own army. In order to prevent the plan of Gu Gu’s invasion of the earth, Qinglong, Tianyi and their partners embarked on a new journey to maintain peace on the earth.(translated from douban)

title: Qi Bo Shaonian
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Huan Bian Jingling Zhi Dangao Tianxin
synopsis: "Huan Bian Jingling Zhi Dangao Tianxin" is a cake-themed animation. It mainly tells that the heroine Mouss Bibi is the princess of the Sweetheart Kingdom. She has a lively, innocent and cute personality, and occasionally a little willful. His dream is to taste. All the delicious cakes all over the world. But he was framed by the servant Ryan who wanted to seize the throne, and lost his sense of taste. So Mousbibi came to the cake village alone to find the power of the "delicious miracle" that can cure all diseases, began a happy life, and obtained a precious piece of A story of friendship.(translated from douban)

title: Jushen Zhan Ji Dui Zhi Guidao Xianfeng
synopsis: The evil spirit creator traitor plans to invade the earth to seize the power of Pangu. At the time of the crisis, four teenagers selected by the gods and spirits stood up. They formed the fourth-generation Titan Strike Team, driving a train that can transform into gods, and forming a giant robot against the invasion of evil forces!(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 巨神战击队之轨道先锋

title: Chao Xian Lie Bing-kai Neng
synopsis: Wolfgang is an orphan from La Paz, the capital of the lunar autonomous city-state. Not long after he was born, his parents were killed in the Battle of Gestad. The grandfather who raised him also passed away three years ago. When Wolfgang was young, his grandfather who served in the POLA military often said that his father was at the Battle of Gestad. Tell him his story and describe his father as a hero. For this reason, Wolfgang was determined to serve the country in the army, and his goal was to become a POLA ace pilot.(translated from douban)

title: Chao Xian Lie Bing-kai Neng Season 2
synopsis: The Mars Army made a comeback and launched an attack on the United Nations Association on Earth. The battle surrounded fierce stalemate, and the space pirates, the moon city-states and the earth were pushed to face the cruel battle of the same death.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 超限獵兵-凱能 第二季

title: Chao Xian Lie Bing Kai Neng OVA
synopsis: In 2458 AD, the Earth and Mars’ gravitational ring emigrated, and a war broke out in the lunar space for the Mars rare earth expropriation event. After both parties paid a painful price, Mars and the Earth terminated all exchanges and opened a brief peace. In the Zero War era, in addition to the threat of Mars, space pirates composed of lunar criminals became increasingly rampant. A hundred years of peace ended in 2588. When a new type of influenza H1Z1 broke out in the lunar city state and was helpless, Mars, which had been isolated for a long time, showed goodwill and sent a medical ship to the moon for humanitarian rescue. Unexpectedly, this false aid turned out to be the beginning of the offensive. The lunar city-state army retreated steadily, and the gravitational ring fell one after another. The Lunar Army relied on the secret weapon of the moon—Kaineng’s power to withstand the aggressive attacks of space pirates and successfully defended the territory. Although the sacrifice was great, he still survived the crisis of being broken. In 2589, the Mars Army made a comeback ignoring the armistice agreement and launched an attack on the United Nations Association with the Earth. The Lunar Army sent a Kaineng force to support the Earth Army. The battle fell into a fierce state of stalemate, and the space pirates, the moon city-states, and the earth were pushed to face a cruel battle of death.(translated from douban)

title: Ling Su Zhengba
synopsis: Aofei Entertainment’s new four-wheel drive animation work lasted for seven years. It tells that Wang Luoqi and Ropero are a pair of tacit racing partners. In order to win the zero-speed four-wheel drive race and realize their dreams, they drove eight-wheeled vehicles. Special four-wheel drive vehicles, all the way through jungles, caves, canyons, deserts, cities, constantly overcome difficulties, defeat opponents, explore the highest state of racing-the mystery of zero speed, and strive to become the inspirational adventure story of the strongest racing driver(translated from douban)

title: Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni Shima
synopsis: A heroic and mighty adventurer dreams of...opening a pharmacy? Red was once a member of the Hero's party, a powerful group destined to save the world from the evil forces of Taraxon, the Raging Demon Lord. That is, until one of his comrades kicked him out. Hoping to live the easy life on the frontier, Red's new goal is to open an apothecary. However, keeping the secret of his former life may not be as simple as he thinks. Especially when the beautiful Rit, an adventurer from his past, shows up and asks to move in with him!  (Source: Yen Press)

details.Synonyms: Banished from the Hero's Party, I Decided to Live a Quiet Life in the Countryside, I Was Kicked out of the Hero's Party Because I Wasn't a True Companion so I Decided to Have a Slow Life at the Frontier
details.Japanese: 真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました

title: Abciee Shuugyou Nikki
synopsis: ABCiee is a bit klutzy and ditsy, but he's full of spunk and he starts his dream job at a TV station! This is a work comedy filled with all kinds of hijinks! "I never knew it was so hard working at a TV station, ciee!" Despite having to face the unknown rules of the TV business, unique coworkers, and guest stars who have very particular quirks, ABCiee takes them head on with his positivity. Work, love, family, whatever goes!! Please watch over ABCiee as he takes on the TV business. (Source: Crunchyroll)

title: SD Gundam World Heroes
synopsis: The balance of the worlds is maintained by heroes. Suddenly, a red-hot meteor falls upon one of these worlds, called Neo World. An amnesiac youth named Wukong Impulse Gundam appears at the point where it landed. The chaos that starts with this incident spreads through the other worlds, one after another. At the same time, Zhuge Liang Freedom Gundam learns via astrology of an impending disaster. He and his sworn friend Liu Bei Unicorn Gundam take action to save the worlds from this crisis, and begin a journey along with Wukong. What will Wukong Impulse Gundam think as he meets the heroes of each world? Will this youth bring about peace or catastrophe? Now begins a new story of heroes! (Source: Official Site)

details.Japanese: SDガンダムワールド ヒーローズ

title: Holo no Graffiti
synopsis: From unraveling the secrets of opening and closing doors to defusing surprise packages more commonly known as bombs, there is never a dull day at the Hololive Production office! Holo no Graffiti follows an eccentric cast of Virtual YouTubers, also known as "VTubers," going about their absurd yet hilarious daily lives, detailing all their cute moments and mishaps.

details.Synonyms: Horogura, HoloGra

title: Jimihen!!: Jimiko wo Kaechau Jun Isei Kouyuu!!
synopsis: The story follows Rena Yukuhasahi, a reserved office lady and Ryouhei Hachiya, a businessman and fellow colleague. Yukuhasahi appears to be the most reserved girl in the company, but becomes a super beautiful woman when she dresses up. Flustered in the presence of her transformed self, Hachiya insists on taking her out, only to find themselves in front of a love hotel. (Source: MAL News)

details.Synonyms: Jimihen!!: Pure Heterosexual Exchange That Changes a Reserved Girl
details.Japanese: じみへんっ!!～地味子を変えちゃう純異性交遊～

synopsis: The series follows the over 3,000 endangered species in the world. (Source: ANN)

details.Synonyms: Extinction Fear-shun.
details.Japanese: ぜつめつきぐしゅんっ。

title: Gundam Build Divers Battlogue
synopsis: It's the highlight of GBN's anniversary event, the "Gunpla Battle One-Day Battle Royal"! Participants are selected from the Divers who played most passionately this season, and they're fighting in machines randomly assigned mainly from those Gunpla ranked highest by all Divers in the Great Gunpla Ballot! Now the final round is about to begin, with the tough fighters who've won their respective blocks! There, an unpredictable, super special, never-seen-before Gunpla dream battle will... START!!! (Source: AniDB)

details.Synonyms: Gundam Build Divers Series: Battlogue
details.Japanese: ガンダムビルドダイバーズ バトローグ

title: Hua Jianghu: Gui Yexing
synopsis: This is a story about growth, friendship and passion. Through the continuous improvement of racing skills, the in-depth understanding of the concept of racing, the understanding of the meaning of life and the friendship of friends, the originally ambitious racer Higashino Ji has gradually grown into the most reliable partner, and will gradually grow into the most powerful racer... (Source: V2Anime)

details.English: Painting the Rails of Rivers and Lakes at Night

title: Sasaki to Miyano
synopsis: Miyano spends his days peacefully reading Boys' Love comics and worrying about how girly his face is-until a chance encounter leads to a scuffle with his senior Sasaki. Intrigued by his feisty junior Miyano, delinquent Sasaki uses every opportunity he can to get closer...  (Source: Yen Press)

details.Synonyms: Sasaki and Miyano

title: Tokyo Gambo
synopsis: The story will take place 100 years after the world was destroyed in the 21st century due to environmental destruction and depletion of resources. The story follows four girls who work at PARK, based on a real store in Harajuku that follows the theme of "Fashion × Otaku × Creation." (Source: ANN)

title: Puparia
synopsis: Independent short animation by Shingo Tamagawa.

title: Bai She Chuan: Bai Su Zhen
synopsis: In order to repay the grace of life-saving a thousand years ago, Bai Suzhen sought out Xu Xian. Unexpectedly, the demon king for a thousand years would be a hindrance, frame Bai Suzhen and be spurned by humans until he lost Xu Xian’s trust. He attacked the human world and occupied Lin'an city as a fortress to fight against the heavens. At the moment of crisis, Bai Suzhen moved the heavens with his true feelings, and finally gained a thousand years of skill and repelled the thousand-year old demon. (Source: V2Anime)

details.Synonyms: Madame White Snake,The Snake: Become Human

title: Xin Shen Bang: Nezha Chonsheng
synopsis: Donghai City, a coastal city, is short of rain and fresh water all the year round. Lin Yunxiang, a young man who loves motorcycles, was attacked by superpowers when his car collided with the rich son of the water supply company, and he awakened the dormant mysterious power in his body-Nezha. Awaiting Li Yunxiang, in addition to the vengeance from the enemy, there is a bigger conspiracy... (Source: V2Anime)

details.Synonyms: New Seal God: Nezha Reborn,New Seal God: Rebirth of Nezha

title: Chu Feng: Yi Dian Zhi Zi
synopsis: Ordinary high school student Haoxuan Sun was taken hostage in a seemingly robbery and rescued by a girl wearing winged battledress with bee bionics designs. Haoxuan Sun’s peaceful life was stirred by the girl – human bioengineering weapon Vanguard Liuli. Discovered that he is the "Son of Eden" wanted by all the great powers, Haoxuan Sun and Liuli have been searching for the truth and fight against the so-called destiny. At the same time, people around Haoxuan Sun, senpai Ye Bai who he has a crash on, his best friend, and many others, were discovered to have a second identities. The new BEE anime is based on the original manga plot. In addition, BEE manga's author Baimao personally joined the production team. The new BEE will also include two subplots entirely new to the viewers. (Source: u17)

details.Synonyms: Chu Feng: SOE, Chu Feng: Son of Eden

synopsis: An animated commercial for Tamaya pawnshop located in Kounanku Ward, Yokohama.

title: Lie Huo Jiao Chou
synopsis: In the current era, a small percentage of people called "Special Abilities" have skills and powers normal humans do not possess. An autonomous organization, the Deviant Control Office, keeps these Special Abilities in check. Though some wish to maintain this order and peace, some wish to take advantage of their abilities and obtain more power in this world.
background: Animated adaptation of priest's web novel of the same title.

title: Prayer X
synopsis: Music video directed and animated by Ryoji Yamada for the song Prayer X by King Gnu In the music video Prayer X, King Gnu takes an abstract and animated approach to mental health topics such as paranoia, anxiety, depression, and suicide. The setting is in a grey monotonous world where the main character is trapped inside a repetitive schedule which slowly drives him insane. (Source: JROCK NEWS)
